entry.title: iOS device CPUs
entry.content:
ARMv7s = iPhone 5, iPad 4 ARMv7 = iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPod 3G/4G/5G, iPad, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad Mini
ARMv6 = iPhone 2G/3G, iPod 1G/2G

entry.title: Set UIWebView's background color
entry.content:
set the webview’s opaque property to NO .. and set the background of the view underneath to green.

when the webview is CDVCordovaView, just set it opaque to NO, and set the view’s background color: self.webView.backgroundColor = BACKGROUND_COLOR;

entry.title: Why can't I use a url scheme starting with a number?
entry.content: It seems ok in iOS 5, but in iOS 6, it won’t work.

entry.title: What happens when url schemes conflict?
entry.content: In iOS, it seems that the one first installed will start.

entry.title: build android project with ant
entry.content:
Converting to ant project

android update project -p or android update project -s -p

solving the “dir.sdk missing” error

sdk.dir is missing. Make sure to generate local.properties using ‘android update project’ or to inject it through an env var.

android update project –target android-17 …
